text:
THANJAVUR

Sri Venkateshwara Group of Institutions, Peravurani: Annual day, A. Arulnithi, secretary, ARJ Group of Institutions, presides, 3 p.m.

Gnanam School of Business, Sengipatti: Budget Analysis, 7 p.m.

PUDUKOTTAI

Sri Bhuvaneswari Avadutha Vidhya Peetam: Abishekam to Kasi Viswanathar, 7 a.m.

J.J. College of Arts and Science: CAIT 2016 – inter-collegiate technical meet, M. Veerappan, principal, H.H. The Rajah’s College, chief guest, 9.30 a.m.

NAGAPATTINAM

AVC College of Engineering: Inauguration of State level workshop on Probability, queuing theory and random processes, M.Senthilmurugan, director (administration), AVC College of Engineering, chief guest, 9.30 a.m.; valediction, K.Karthikeyan, secretary, AVC Educational Institutions,chief guest, 4 p.m.

PERAMBALUR

Arulmigu Madhanagopalaswamy Temple: Thiruther vellottam, 10 a.m.
title: engagements
